Name: Francisco Javier Luna
Description:
Francisco died as a result of multiple gunshot wounds, including shots to the face, stomach, and shoulder.

Police identified a suspect who may have been upset after finding out Francisco's transgender status and killed them as a result.

https://texasobituaryproject.org/030401luna.html
Tweet:
Francisco Javier Luna died as a result of multiple gunshot wounds in Houston, Texas (USA) on 4 Mar 2001.

They were 29. #SayTheirName #TransLivesMatter #TDoR
